name: Chat App
description: Simple chat app without frontend libriaries, using Socket.io .

name: Concert tickets
description: Order a ticket for a concert and book a seat. My job was to make a Rest api, use that api in the React's frontend and all the logic. And use Socket.io in some cases.

name: Todo list
description: Todo list - app on node-js and Express with real time update with Socket.io .

name: Personal page
description: Simple personal page with contact form with file upload using Node.js, Express and handlebars template language.

name: Electron app 1
description: An Electron app which main goal is to count down time from 20 minutes for work and then 5 minutes break.

name: Picture Watermark app
description: A command line app made with Inquirer and Jimp which add text or image watermark on image chosen from img folder.
